desc: Breathe. Eat. Drink. Located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, Presse Cafe at Les Suites Hotel offers specialty coffee and quick and healthy food options, including our own panini sandwiches, salads, pastries, breakfast, desserts, and more. Email us for catering options!

layout.text: We're with you in these times.
We're now available for dine-in, for takeout via online order/by phone at 613-233-4183, and for delivery via Uber Eats, Doordash, & SkiptheDishes!
